channel.title: I need some quick help! THIS IS URGENT!
channel.description:
Hi,
I just downloaded Allstar-scape V2 and set up no-ip with a server called 'Screechscape.no-ip.biz'. Now, I configured my router and everything and allowed a port through my firewall called Screechscape.no-ip.biz. I renamed everything in Client'java to my server's name. Then on the No-IP website, I set up my server and used the ip it says to use up in the corner of it. I also set up the downloaded no-ip thing. I opened up a Runserver. I'm using jdk1.6.0_06 and jre1.6.0_06. i need some help here, because when I get to the register page, it says 'The server ScreechScape.no-ip.biz is offline, it must be online before you can register it here.' I used the Name of the server. this is what I did:
Name: SCREECHSCAPE.NO-IP.BIZ IP: THE IP NO-IP GAVE ME Port: 43594 Password (to edit info): MY PASSWORD Re-type Password: MYP PASSWORD
Then, I tried to get it on with a runserver open. Nothing happened..
Hopefully, someone can help me. Please don't flame and leave rude comments, I am not a noob at this, I have basic knowledge. I have had one before, but it went down.
-X

item.title: I need some quick help! THIS IS URGENT!
item.dc:creator: @jarnohhh jarnohhh
item.description:
@jarnohhh wrote:

Go portforward

item.title: I need some quick help! THIS IS URGENT!
item.dc:creator: @pk_man_owned pk_man_owned
item.description:
@pk_man_owned wrote:

Hi,

I just downloaded Allstar-scape V2 and set up no-ip with a server called ‘Screechscape.no-ip.biz’. Now, I configured my router and everything and allowed a port through my firewall called Screechscape.no-ip.biz. I renamed everything in Client’java to my server’s name. Then on the No-IP website, I set up my server and used the ip it says to use up in the corner of it. I also set up the downloaded no-ip thing. I opened up a Runserver. I’m using jdk1.6.0_06 and jre1.6.0_06. i need some help here, because when I get to the register page, it says ‘The server ScreechScape.no-ip.biz is offline, it must be online before you can register it here.’ I used the Name of the server. this is what I did:

Name: SCREECHSCAPE.NO-IP.BIZ
IP: THE IP NO-IP GAVE ME
Port: 43594
Password (to edit info): MY PASSWORD
Re-type Password: MYP PASSWORD

Then, I tried to get it on with a runserver open. Nothing happened…

Hopefully, someone can help me. Please don’t flame and leave rude comments, I am not a noob at this, I have basic knowledge. I have had one before, but it went down.

-X

here try downloading this and run it before you register your server
http://www.no-ip.com/downloads.php

oh and make sure to log on when registering

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

What he said ^^^

Unless, you just have to wait a while…
Or, you may have typed in the wrong ip which no-ip.com gave you. Because there are 2, one which is numbers, like 89.222.241 etc.
and the other which is the ip that you wanna type in.

item.title: I need some quick help! THIS IS URGENT!
item.dc:creator: @X_Screech_X X Screech X
item.description:
@X_Screech_X wrote:

I’m not too sure what you guys mean. Can you guys give me some examples? Like how cna I log in without it being registered on the thing and online? Like can I open it with a special client and play on it if it is offline? And what is a static ip?

Read full topic
